description: Convert the HCD ADU Handbook (January 2025, 54 pages) into a structured Claude Code skill with ~30 reference files organized as a regulatory decision engine.

phases.name: Skeleton + Root Files
phases.description: Create the skill directory structure and the three root files: SKILL.md (decision tree router), AGENTS.md (reference catalog), and CLAUDE.md symlink.

verification.description: Verify root files exist and contain correct structure
steps: Confirm adu-skill-development/skill/california-adu/ directory exists
Confirm SKILL.md contains decision tree with 4 steps and quick-reference thresholds table
Confirm AGENTS.md lists all 27 planned reference files with descriptions
Confirm CLAUDE.md is a symlink pointing to AGENTS.md

phases.name: Unit Types
phases.description: Create the 4 unit-type reference files. These are foundational — most other rules reference back to ADU type classification.

verification.description: Verify unit type files exist with proper content
steps: All 4 files exist in references/ with proper YAML frontmatter
unit-types-66323.md contains the ADU combinations table
unit-types-jadu.md contains 500 sqft limit and owner-occupancy rules
Cross-references between unit type files resolve correctly
Key code sections (Gov. Code §§ 65852.2, 65852.22, 66323) match raw source

phases.name: Development Standards
phases.description: Create the 7 development standards reference files. These are the most frequently referenced rules in permit review.

verification.description: Verify standards files and cross-check thresholds
steps: All 7 files exist in references/ with proper YAML frontmatter
Threshold values in reference files match the SKILL.md thresholds table
Height limits correctly distinguish base/transit/multistory/attached scenarios
Parking exemption categories are all listed
Cross-references resolve correctly

phases.name: Permitting + Fees
phases.description: Create the 3 permitting and fees reference files covering process timelines, fee calculations, and funding sources.

verification.description: Verify permit process and fee files
steps: All 3 files exist in references/ with proper YAML frontmatter
permit-process.md contains 30-day completeness and 60-day approval timelines
permit-fees.md contains <750 sqft fee exemption threshold
permit-funding.md covers CalHFA, FHA, Freddie Mac, Fannie Mae programs
Timeline and fee numbers match raw source

phases.name: Zoning + Ownership
phases.description: Create the 6 zoning and ownership reference files covering jurisdiction rules, hazard zones, owner-occupancy, and HOA restrictions.

steps: All 6 files exist in references/ with proper YAML frontmatter
zoning-hazards.md covers both fire hazard zones and coastal zone
ownership-hoa.md contains CC&R nullification rules
ownership-use.md contains 30-day minimum rental term
Preemption rules are clearly stated where applicable
Cross-references resolve correctly

phases.name: Special + Compliance + Glossary + Legislative
phases.description: Create the remaining 8 reference files covering special housing types, compliance/enforcement, glossary of terms, and legislative history.

steps: All 8 files exist in references/ with proper YAML frontmatter
glossary.md covers all defined terms from pages 8-12 of the handbook
legislative-changes.md includes bill summaries, SB 477 renumbering table, and statutory changes table
compliance-unpermitted.md contains pre-Jan 1 2020 amnesty cutoff
special-sb9.md covers four-unit cap and lot split interactions

phases.name: Review + Cross-Reference Pass
phases.description: Final quality review: completeness check, cross-reference validation, citation verification, routing test, and size check.

steps: No significant content from raw markdown was dropped
Every 'See also:' cross-reference resolves to a real file
Spot-checked Gov. Code section numbers are accurate
3-4 example scenarios route correctly through SKILL.md decision tree
No reference file exceeds ~3K
AGENTS.md catalog matches actual file listing

tasks.description: Create directory structure and CLAUDE.md symlink
steps: Create directory: adu-skill-development/skill/california-adu/references/
Create symlink: CLAUDE.md → AGENTS.md in the skill root

tasks.description: Create SKILL.md with decision tree, routing logic, and thresholds table
steps: Read the plan file for the SKILL.md design specification (decision tree + thresholds table)
Read HCD-ADU-Handbook-2025-raw.md for overview content to include
Write SKILL.md with: title/description, 4-step decision tree router, quick-reference thresholds table, and usage instructions
Target ~200 lines, under 5000 words

tasks.description: Create AGENTS.md with full catalog of all planned reference files
steps: Read the plan file for the complete reference file listing
Write AGENTS.md listing all 27 reference files organized by prefix category
Each entry should have: filename, one-line description, key code sections
Target ~120 lines

tasks.description: Create unit-types-66323.md — the four Gov. Code § 66323 ADU categories + combinations table
steps: Read raw markdown pages 18-20 for 66323 content
Extract the four categories: (a) converted from existing, (b) attached/detached on single-family, (c) converted on multifamily, (d) detached on multifamily
Include the ADU combinations table showing what's allowed on each lot type
Add YAML frontmatter with title, category, relevance, key_code_sections
Add cross-references to related files

tasks.description: Create unit-types-adu-general.md — ADU definition, attached/converted/detached types
steps: Read raw markdown pages 21 and 41-42 for general ADU type content
Cover: ADU definition, three physical types (attached, detached, converted), when each applies
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create unit-types-jadu.md — JADU-specific rules (500 sqft, owner-occupancy, etc.)
steps: Read raw markdown pages 28-29 for JADU content
Cover: 500 sq ft limit, must be within existing/proposed single-family, owner-occupancy requirement, separate entrance, efficiency kitchen
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create unit-types-multifamily.md — multifamily converted + detached ADU rules
steps: Read raw markdown pages 32-33 for multifamily content
Cover: converted ADUs from non-livable space, detached ADUs (up to 8 or 25% of units), size limits
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create standards-height.md — height limits by ADU type and context (16/18/20/25 ft)
steps: Read raw markdown pages 25-26 for height content
Cover: 16 ft base detached, 18 ft near transit or multistory, 20 ft in some contexts, 25 ft attached
Clearly distinguish which height applies in which scenario
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create standards-size.md — size requirements (850/1000/1200 sqft, FAR, efficiency units)
steps: Read raw markdown pages 39-40 for size content
Cover: min 150 sq ft efficiency, 850 sq ft 1-BR, 1000 sq ft 2+BR, max 1200 sq ft detached, FAR/lot coverage rules
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create standards-setbacks.md — setback rules (4-ft side/rear, front setback limits)
steps: Read raw markdown page 38 for setback content
Cover: 4 ft max for side and rear setbacks, front setback rules, no setback for conversions, existing garage setbacks
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create standards-parking.md — parking requirements + 6 exemption categories
steps: Read raw markdown pages 34-35 for parking content
Cover: max 1 space per ADU, all 6 exemption categories (transit, historic, car share, etc.)
Note: no parking required for JADUs or ADUs created under 66323(a)
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create standards-fire.md — fire protection + sprinkler rules
steps: Read raw markdown page 23 for fire/sprinkler content
Cover: when sprinklers are required, fire access, fire hazard zone implications
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create standards-solar.md — solar/energy code requirements
steps: Read raw markdown page 40 for solar/energy content
Cover: CalGreen/Title 24 requirements, when solar is required for ADUs
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create standards-design.md — objective vs subjective standards, bedrooms
steps: Read raw markdown page 21 for design standards content
Cover: prohibition on subjective design standards, what counts as objective, bedroom requirements
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create permit-process.md — ministerial review, 30/60 day timelines, deemed-approved
steps: Read raw markdown pages 35-37 for permit process content
Cover: ministerial (non-discretionary) approval, 30-day completeness check, 60-day approval deadline, deemed-approved provision
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create permit-fees.md — impact fees, proportionality, school fees, utility connections
steps: Read raw markdown pages 22-23 for fee content
Cover: <750 sq ft fee exemption, proportionality requirement, school fee rules, connection fees, sewer/water
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create permit-funding.md — CalHFA, FHA, Freddie Mac, Fannie Mae ADU financing
steps: Read raw markdown pages 24-25 for funding/financing content
Cover: CalHFA ADU grant, FHA guidelines, Freddie Mac, Fannie Mae programs
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create zoning-general.md — jurisdiction-wide rules, density, density bonus (SDBL)
steps: Read raw markdown pages 43-45 for general zoning content
Cover: ADUs don't count toward density, density bonus law interaction, SDBL, zoning override provisions
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create zoning-hazards.md — fire hazard zones, coastal zone, environmental constraints
steps: Read raw markdown pages 21-22 (coastal) and 44 (fire) for hazard zone content
Cover: very high fire hazard severity zones, coastal zone rules, Coastal Commission role, environmental constraints
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create zoning-nonconforming.md — nonconforming zoning + building code violations
steps: Read raw markdown page 33 for nonconforming content
Cover: nonconforming zoning (ADU can still be built), building code violations on existing structures, correction requirements
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create ownership-use.md — owner-occupancy, rental terms (30-day min), deed restrictions
steps: Read raw markdown pages 34, 37 for ownership/use content
Cover: no owner-occupancy required for ADUs (only JADUs), 30-day minimum rental term, short-term rental prohibition, deed restrictions
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create ownership-sales.md — separate conveyance, condominiums, qualified nonprofits
steps: Read raw markdown pages 22, 37 for sales/conveyance content
Cover: separate conveyance rules, condominium conversion (AB 1033), qualified nonprofit requirements
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create ownership-hoa.md — HOA restrictions, CC&R nullification, HOA review limits
steps: Read raw markdown pages 26-27 for HOA content
Cover: CC&Rs cannot prohibit ADUs, HOA review timeline limits, reasonable restrictions, AB 1033 condo provisions
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create special-manufactured.md — manufactured homes + mobilehome parks
steps: Read raw markdown pages 31-32 for manufactured housing content
Cover: manufactured homes as ADUs, HCD certification, mobilehome park rules
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create special-sb9.md — SB 9 interaction, four-unit cap, lot splits
steps: Read raw markdown pages 37-38 for SB 9 content
Cover: SB 9 urban lot split, four-unit cap on single-family lots, interaction between ADU law and SB 9
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create compliance-unpermitted.md — pre-2020 amnesty, inspections, fee exemptions
steps: Read raw markdown pages 42-43 for unpermitted ADU content
Cover: before Jan 1, 2020 amnesty provision, inspection process, fee exemptions/waivers, 5-year protection period
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create compliance-ordinances.md — local ordinances, HCD enforcement, bonus programs
steps: Read raw markdown pages 30-31 for local ordinance content
Cover: local ADU ordinance requirements, HCD review/enforcement powers, bonus unit programs
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create compliance-housing.md — housing elements, RHNA, Prohousing Designation
steps: Read raw markdown pages 27-28 for housing element content
Cover: housing element requirements, RHNA credit for ADUs, Prohousing Designation Program
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create compliance-utilities.md — utility connections, CPUC complaints
steps: Read raw markdown page 43 for utilities content
Cover: separate utility connections, utility company requirements, CPUC complaint process
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Create glossary.md — all defined terms with legal citations
steps: Read raw markdown pages 8-12 for glossary content
Extract every defined term with its definition and legal citation
Format as an alphabetical reference with clear term/definition/citation structure
Add YAML frontmatter

tasks.description: Create legislative-changes.md — bill summaries + SB 477 renumbering table + statutory changes table
steps: Read raw markdown pages 13-17 for recent legislative changes and pages 46-54 for statutory tables
Include: all bill summaries (2022-2024 legislation), SB 477 renumbering table, statutory changes table
This will likely be the largest reference file — ensure it stays under 3K if possible, split if needed
Add YAML frontmatter and cross-references

tasks.description: Completeness check — compare raw markdown against all reference files
steps: Read adu-skill-development/HCD-ADU-Handbook-2025-raw.md
Read all reference files in skill/california-adu/references/
Identify any significant content from the handbook that was not captured in any reference file
If gaps found, either add content to existing files or create new reference files
Update AGENTS.md if any new files were added

tasks.description: Cross-reference check — verify all 'See also:' links resolve to real files
steps: Read all reference files and extract every 'See also:' cross-reference
Verify each referenced filename exists in the references/ directory
Fix any broken references

tasks.description: Citation check — spot-check Gov. Code section numbers against raw source
steps: Select 10 Gov. Code section citations from across the reference files
Verify each one against the raw markdown source
Fix any incorrect citations

tasks.description: Routing check — walk example scenarios through SKILL.md decision tree
steps: Scenario 1: 600 sq ft detached ADU on single-family lot in Placentia — verify correct references load
Scenario 2: JADU conversion in existing single-family home — verify JADU rules load
Scenario 3: Detached ADU near transit on multifamily lot — verify transit height bonus and multifamily rules load
Scenario 4: Unpermitted ADU built in 2018 seeking legalization — verify amnesty rules load
For each scenario, trace through the decision tree and confirm the right set of reference files would be loaded

tasks.description: Size check + final AGENTS.md sync
steps: Check the file size of every reference file — flag any over ~3K
If any are too large, consider splitting into sub-topics
Verify AGENTS.md catalog matches the actual file listing in references/
Update AGENTS.md descriptions if any files were modified during review
